channel.title: If player on AbsX AbsY

item.title: If player on AbsX AbsY
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

You basicly said it.

if (absX == num && absY == num) {
	        c.sendQuest("~universionpk Donation Information~", 8144);  //Title
		c.sendQuest("", 8145);
		c.clearQuestInterface();
		c.sendQuest("Donating keeps the server running..", 8148);
		c.sendQuest("The server isn't affordable without donations...", 8149);
		c.sendQuest("Donate to get rewards!", 8150);
                c.sendQuest("You can donate by creditcard, mail, bank + more...", 8152);
                c.sendQuest("Click 'Donate' at the top of your client..", 8153);
                c.sendQuest("DONATION REWARDS ARE DELIVERED AUTOMATICALLY!!!", 8154);
                c.sendQuest("~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~", 8155);
		c.sendQuest("- PRICES AND REWARDS -", 8156);
                c.sendQuest("~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~", 8157);
	        c.sendQuest("$2 - 150M", 8158);
		c.sendQuest("$4 - 300M", 8159);
		c.sendQuest("$5 - 500M", 8160);
		c.sendQuest("$10 - 1B (500M x2)", 8161);
		c.sendQuest("$5 - Armadyl Godsowrd", 8162);
		c.sendQuest("$15 - Party-Hat Set", 8163);
		c.sendQuest("$10 - 1.3k PC Points", 8164);
		c.sendQuest("$5 - 1k Each pot", 8165);
		c.sendQuest("$5 - 99 Stat", 8166);
		c.sendQuest("$3 - Firescape", 8167);
		c.sendQuest("", 8168);
	        c.sendQuest("Donating will also get you 100 donation points!", 8169);
	        c.sendQuest("To spend ad the Donation shop in edge!", 8170);
		c.sendQuest("", 8171);
		c.sendQuest("To see how many donation points you have do ::dpoints", 8172);
		c.sendQuestSomething(8143);
		c.showInterface(8134);
		c.sM("Forum - www.universion.tk");
}

Read full topic
